name: Space Ops
description:
Space Ops is a fast paced twin stick shooter about running, shooting, and dodging enemy bullets. Play as a bad ass space soldier going up against the nastiest aliens in the galaxy.

Features:

  • 3 Weapons
  • 2 enemy types
  • 2 levels
  • Mouse/Keyboard and controller support
  • Challenge mode

This was a student project created in 8 weeks by a team of 6 using the Unity game engine.

For more information about this project or the team behind it, contact: Markrestart@gmail.com
